level.text: Each sponsor whose apprenticeship program has been deregistered pursuant to this Chapter may be reinstated by applying to the Apprenticeship Council and demonstrating that the apprenticeship program is operating in accordance with this Chapter.
Before denying an application for reinstatement, the Apprenticeship Council shall afford a sponsor the opportunity for a hearing in accordance with the provisions of section 1104 of this Chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 37 DCR 6005(September 14, 1990).
